comment:
logistics:Logistics refers to the detailed coordination of a complex operation involving many people, facilities, or supplies.
units of water per minute:This refers to the amount of water that can be transported through the pipes in a given time frame, typically measured in gallons or liters per minute.
minimize:To minimize means to reduce to the smallest possible amount or degree. In this context, it refers to finding the solution that requires the fewest total number of pipes.
